name: Ghost Shaman
description:
This is my first game ever finished, on my first ever jam entered.

Ghost Shaman is a game about a ... Shaman. Enter the portals into the ghost dimension and collect the jewels to release the blocks ...blocking your way!

be careful, the ghost dimension is full of ... ghosts and creatures that can very well harm you. 

Hope you like it, would love as much feedback as you can give!

Sorry for no music and very few levels I didnt had enough time :(
